review: Doctor listened to the problem patiently and explained the problem clearly. Also given some remedies to avoid these in future.

Visited Dr arvind on friends referral whom he operated on 2 yrs back for back and doing well me had back problem visited 2 doctors from yashoda and care both advised surgery and went to sir for third opinion sir gave option of epidural steroid before surgery and got it done the same day at his clinic ot after 2hrs doctor made me walk and pain in my leg came down drastically felt like magic kudos to this doc will rate him best for spine
